resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82270</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82270</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4467</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formal Letters</string>
            <string language="es">Cartas formales</string>
            <string language="ga">Litreacha Foirmiúla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formale Zeichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lettres officielles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Letras Formais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettere Convenzionali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίσημες επιστολές</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet with useful Italian phrases relevant to writing letters. Full-page examples and opening and closing greetings are included.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo con frases útiles en italiano para escribir cartas. Se incluyen unos ejemplos de páginas completas y saludos de apertura y de cierre.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre le frásaí úsáideacha Iodáilise a bhaineann le scríobh litreacha. Samplaí leathanach iomlán agus áirítear leis beannachtaí oscailte agus dúnadh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Italian</string>
            <string language="es">Italiano. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Iodáilis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen mit den nützlichen italienischen Phrasen 
relevant zu den Schreiben Zeichen. Ganzseitige Beispiele und 
Öffnung und Schließengrüße sind enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau avec des expressions italiennes utiles 
concernant des lettres d'écriture. Les exemples et les 
salutations sur une page entière d'ouverture et de fermeture sont 
inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha com as frases italianas úteis relevantes 
às letras da escrita. Os exemplos e os cumprimentos full-page 
da abertura e do fechamento são incluídos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro con le frasi italiane utili 
relative alle lettere di scrittura. Gli esempi ed i saluti fuori
testo di chiusura e di apertura sono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας με τις χρήσιμες ιταλικές φράσεις 
σχετικές με το γράψιμο των επιστολών. Τα ολόκληρης σελίδας 
παραδείγματα και το άνοιγμα και οι χαιρετισμοί κλεισίματος 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Italienisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Italien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιταλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4467</entry>
          </identifier>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        <classification>
